title: Parse C2D File Format From Cyclus2 Ergometers
text: Working Cyclus2 data native .c2d file format many advantages derived, exported formats: .c2d files include information, e.g., bike settings impossible export. Depending export settings, exported files may lack data (later) interest, may lack numerical precision. Simpler procedure: need save data twice, export analysis .c2d archiving. Interoperability: Even single lab, agreeing export format take time effort, change may make previously exported data incompatible. contrast, .c2d files remain , even across labs, thus analysis scripts remain compatible.
